configDesc: Create the config file to override default configuration.
embededServerPortDesc: Port of the embeded PRPL server.
testToRunDesc: Test to run. Either a specific html file or the test/index.html one.
testPathDesc: Path to the folder where your tests are.
chromePathDesc: Path to your Chrome or Chromium installation.
multipleFilesError: Not implemented yet. Please use an index.html file in your test folder.
notExistingTest: The specified test to run does not exist.
watchDesc: Watch files changes and run tests (default: true)
